기본정보.수업목표: In 21st century, a new paradigm of urban development is 'Sustainable Development & Smart City Planning'. To reach the sustainability and Smartness, Lots of countries try to change their cities from the image of 'gray city' to 'green one' and from 'old city' to 'technology oriented one'. What does it mean and how can we reach sustainability and Smartness? In this course, we will discuss principles and methodologies of new urban development by additional use of practical fieldwork.
